docs.snippet: He was found dead in bed the next morning, an empty bottle of whiskey on the floor by his side....
docs.lead_paragraph: He was found dead in bed the next morning, an empty bottle of whiskey on the floor by his side.

docs.snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey’s announcement of an unusual special election was immediately criticized for costing the state $24 million and for setting up a schedule that was likely to confuse the voting public....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey’s announcement of an unusual special election was immediately criticized for costing the state $24 million and for setting up a schedule that was likely to confuse the voting public.
docs.abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie's announcement of highly unusual special Senate election to fill the seat of the late Sen Frank R Lautenberg is immediately criticized for costing state $24 million and potentially confusing the voting public; Democrats accuse Christie of squandering taxpayer money to protect his own political ambitions, and Republicans say he has betrayed their interests.

headline.seo: Christie Criticized for Cost and Timing of Senate Election
headline.main: Christie Decides on October Vote for New Senator
headline.print_headline: Christie Decides On October Vote For New Senator

byline.contributor: Kate Zernike reported from Trenton, and David M. Halbfinger from New York. Raymond Hernandez and Jeremy W. Peters contributed reporting from Washington.
byline.original: By KATE ZERNIKE and DAVID M. HALBFINGER

docs.snippet: Mr. Jones, who was inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1980 after a 14-year career, used his size and strength to glamorize defensive play and master the sack, mostly for the Los Angeles Rams....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Jones, who was inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1980 after a 14-year career, used his size and strength to glamorize defensive play and master the sack, mostly for the Los Angeles Rams.
docs.abstract: Deacon Jones, prototype of the pass-rushing defensive end who became a master of the sack and one of the NFL’s greatest defensive players with the Los Angeles Rams’ line known as the Fearsome Foursome, dies at age 74.

headline.seo: Deacon Jones, Fearsome N.F.L. Defensive End, Dies at 74
headline.main: Deacon Jones Dies at 74; Made Quarterback Sack Brutal and Enthralling
headline.print_headline: Deacon Jones Dies at 74; Made Quarterback Sack Brutal and Enthralling
